cellularAutomata.artificialLife.geneticOperator
Interface GeneticOperator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Crossover, Mutation
public interface GeneticOperator

A genetic operator such as crossover, mutation, or other.

Author:
David Bahr

Method Summary
 Chromosome[] performOperation(Chromosome[] chromosomes)
          The genetic operation.
 

Method Detail

performOperation

Chromosome[] performOperation(Chromosome[] chromosomes)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
The genetic operation.

Parameters:
chromosomes - The chromosomes on which the operation takes place. For example, for standard crossover, this would be the two parents. For mutation this would be the single chromsome being mutated.
Returns:
The result of the genetic operation, a single chromosome or multiple chromosomes.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there are too many or too few chromosomes in the parameter array.
